Question: In 2006, this person provided his voice for the 2006 animated film Happy Feet, as an elephant seal named Trev.
Hints: This person was a keen promoter for Australian tourism in general and Queensland tourism in particular.
This person loved mixed martial arts competitions and trained with Greg Jackson in the fighting/grappling system of Gaidojutsu.
The Sea Shepherd Conservation Society ship MY **** was named in his honour.
